hero.headline: Apply for your Doctorate at TUM CIT
hero.subline: TUMapply is your gateway to doctoral research at the School of Computation, Information and Technology

doctoralJourney.headline: Start your Doctoral Journey at TUM CIT
doctoralJourney.text:
TUMApply is your entry point to doctoral research at the Technical University of Munich. Here you can explore open positions across all departments of the TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology, discover opportunities that fit your interests, and submit your application directly online.
Wondering what makes TUM the right place for your doctorate? With our vibrant research environment, global networks, and strong support structures, TUM offers the ideal conditions to pursue your academic goals. The {{startLink}}TUM Graduate School{{endLink}} accompanies you throughout the process. From meeting prerequisites and navigating requirements to developing your research profile.

checkPrerequisites.title: Check Prerequisites
checkPrerequisites.description: Ensure you meet the {{startLink}}eligibility criteria{{endLink}} to pursue a doctorate at TUM.

browsePositions.title: Browse Positions
browsePositions.description: Use filters to find relevant positions across different research groups.

checkDetails.title: Check Details
checkDetails.description: Read the job description, check eligibility, and see which documents are required.

submitApplication.title: Submit Application
submitApplication.description: Create an account, upload your documents, and submit your application.

trackStatus.title: Track Status
trackStatus.description: Get email updates on your application, new openings, and saved postings.

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheadline: Find quick answers to common queries about TUMApply
faq.sub-subheadline: For further questions, please refer to the documentation

login.title: How do I log in to TUMApply?
login.content: You can log in using your TUM credentials, or alternatively via Google or Apple Single Sign-On.

multipleApplications.title: Can I apply for multiple Doctoral positions at once?
multipleApplications.content: Yes, you can apply to multiple positions. Each application is handled individually by the respective supervisors.

documents.title: What documents are required?
documents.content: You typically need a CV, transcripts, and degree certificates. Additional documents may be requested depending on the position.

status.title: How do I know my application status?
status.content: You will be notified by email once the status of your application changes. You can also track the status on your TUMApply dashboard, if you created an account.
